body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarShop Customer Service. My name is Steven Brown. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Frances. Could you kindly provide your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five two eight four one seven six nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I have your email address, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Frances. Is there anything specific I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm just calling to say how impressed I am with the service I received at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful to hear! We appreciate your feedback, Frances. Thank you for your time.
